title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
that the mind flayer's worm connected the both of you. Whatever you do, in the end, the tadpoles will connect your mind and Astarion agrees to join the team, which will begin The Pale Elf Companion quest. You will then need to continue with Astarion in your party.

Continue Traveling with Astarion

We met a strange Elf who had also been infected with a parasite. He was hostile at first, but agreed to join us when he learned we were infected too.

Your next main interaction with Astarion will be
